name: Gauge Chart
description: The Gauge Chart component is a chart whose purpose is to show the goal and the progress that has already been made.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable a component.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to disable a component.

properties.name: goal
properties.label: Goal
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a goal.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify a goal.

properties.name: progress
properties.label: Progress
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a progress.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify a progress.
